question:
Who among the following has / have contributed in the Advaita literature?
1. Gaudapada
2. Shankara
3. Vachaspati
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Gau·∏çapada was an early medieval era Hindu philosopher and scholar of the Advaita Vedanta school of Hindu philosophy. Shankaracharya is the founder of Advaita Philosophy. Vachaspati Mishra was a 9th century hindu philosopher of the Advaita Vedanta tradition. So all the above are correct.
